short_summary: March 15, 2023 - The Department of Public Works and Government Services is issuing an open tender for West Breakwater Repairs in Sandford, Nova Scotia.
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada *PWGSC* has a requirement for the modifications to the existing rubblemound breakwater located in *Sandford, NS*. The project includes delivering the repaired breakwater in 14 weeks after award of contract.
full_summary:
### Inviting Qualifications for West Breakwater Repairs in Sandford, Nova Scotia

**Reference Number:** WS3894698634
**Publication Date:** February 28, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 15, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada invites qualified contractors to bid on the repair of the existing rubblemound breakwater located in Sandford, Nova Scotia.

**Project Description:**

We are seeking a contractor to modify the existing rubblemound breakwater in Sandford, NS. The project delivery date is expected to be 14 weeks after the contract award.

**Tender Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Nova Scotia

**Information for Respondents:**

* For more information, please visit the Ariba Discovery posting at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15552193?extsite=MTU1NTIxOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Adam Beaumaster at adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any queries.

**Important Dates:**

* March 15, 2023: Tender closing date at 2:00 PM EDT.

Please note that this tender is only open to qualified contractors who have met the eligibility criteria. The bid submission must be made through Ariba Discovery by the deadline. To ensure compliance with the tender requirements, please refer to the Ariba Discovery posting.

**Bid Security:**

Bid security will be a requirement for this tender during the second phase.

We look forward to receiving your submissions!
